Package it.polimi.wifidirect

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeviceListFragment.DeviceActionListener
    An interface-callback for the activity to listen to fragment interaction events.
    WiFiDeviceListAdapter.ItemClickListener
    DeviceListFragment implements this interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BuildConfig  
    DeviceDetailFragment
    A fragment that manages a particular peer and allows interaction with device i.e. setting up network connection and transferring data.
    DeviceListFragment
    A ListFragment that displays available peers on discovery and requests the parent activity to handle user interaction events.
    FileTransferService
    A service that process each file transfer request i.e Intent by opening a socket connection with the WiFi Direct Group Owner and writing the file Copyright 2011 Google Inc.
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    WiFiDetailClientListAdapter
    ListAdapter of P2PDevice.
    WiFiDetailClientListAdapter.ViewHolder
    The ViewHolder of this Adapter, useful to store e recycle element for performance reasons.
    WiFiDeviceListAdapter
    ListAdapter of P2PDevice.
    WiFiDeviceListAdapter.ViewHolder
    The ViewHolder of this Adapter, useful to store e recycle element for performance reasons.
    WiFiDirectActivity
    An activity that uses WiFi Direct APIs to discover and connect with available devices.
    WiFiDirectBroadcastReceiver
    A BroadcastReceiver that notifies of important wifi p2p events.
